column1: 10 pts - Great job identifying the business function of 2D renderings and explaining how scrum/sprint methodologies could benefit this process. Keep up the good work!

12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how scrum/sprint could operate. Great job in explaining the benefits and process of implementing scrum/sprint for the product design function. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the poor fit of kanban for certain functions, but could be more specific and clear in your explanation. Keep up the good work!

10 pts - Great job identifying the marketing department as a business function that could benefit from kanban methodologies and providing a clear explanation of how it could operate. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job on explaining the process and providing specific examples for the business function. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit

Comment: Good effort in explaining the application of scrum/sprint and kanban methodologies, but the discussion on why scrum/sprint is a poor fit for certain functions could be clearer and more specific. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation. Great job identifying loss aversion bias and providing specific examples and suggestions for Jackson to consider in his decision-making process. Keep up the good work!

6 pts - Noticeable errors or misunderstanding in the definition.

Your description of loss aversion is accurate, but it doesn't fully address the prompt's request for a definition of the selected bias. Please provide a more complete definition and explanation of how it could impact Jackson's decision-making process.

12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job explaining the challenges and benefits of applying Agile and Kanban methodologies to Mighty Jaxx's business functions. Keep up the good work!
10/10 - Excellent work! You provided a clear and detailed description of the steps and actions for both Agile and Kanban methodologies. Keep up the great work!
